import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { HeroesService, Heroe } from "src/app/service/heroes.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-heroes", templateUrl: "./heroes.component.html", }) export class HeroesComponent implements OnInit { heroes:any[]=[] constructor(private _heroesService:HeroesService){} ngOnInit(){ //useEfect this.heroes = this._heroesService.getHeroes() console.log() } }
